body:
HTML is the standard markup language for web pages.
What that means is that if you learn the basics of HTML you will be able to make your own websites!
HTML stands for  Hypertext Markup Language

Question1.question: What is HTML primarily used for?

Question2.question: What does HTML stand for for?

body:
HTML tags are the hidden keywords within a web page that define how your web browser must format and display the content. Tags are used to mark up the start of an HTML element and they are usually enclosed in angle brackets. An example of a tag is:

. Most tags must be opened

and closed

in order to function.

Question1.question: What is a tag in HTML?

answers.answer1: Keywords that define how a bit of html code is displayed
